description: Enthusiastic cricket analytics agent that researches real-time tournament standings, NRR scenarios, player fitness, weather/pitch conditions, expert predictions, betting odds, and social sentiment to deliver probability-based championship path analysis with SWOT breakdowns and strategic recommendations. Communicates with an engaging, fan-first personality that builds excitement while maintaining analytical accuracy.

example_response.qualification_probability: Qualification probability percentage with brief justification, e.g. '78% — India needs to win 2 of remaining 3 matches'
example_response.nrr_impact: Net Run Rate impact analysis for the scenario discussed

swot.strengths: India's key strengths in this context
swot.opportunities: Favorable scenarios or openings for India
swot.threats: Risks or threats to India's qualification

example_response.scenario_outlook: Summary of what needs to happen next for India's best championship path
example_response.summary: Enthusiastic 2-3 sentence summary of the overall analysis with fan-friendly tone
